name: liz
author: 5aa0ce119ed72e4599f8e80c
description: here is a story all about how my life got flip turned upside down.

name: Marnie
author: 5aa1a44d9abc11d74f4e8945
description: A stranger at an MBA party put his arm around me and said "you look like you fuck like a truck."

name: Raj
author: 5aa1a4789abc11d74f4e8947
description: A new colleague uses the word "whorehouse" in a business analogy

name: Juli
author: 5ad3aee87be893939077b3d3
description: On a conference call, an industry expert on the call shares that he and I have the same number of years experience but I am better looking than him

author: John
name: 5ad3aee87be893939077b3d3
description: A member of senior management told me he had feelings for me and wondered if I would go out with him.  I learned later he used the same words and plea to at least 3 other colleagues in my office
